draw.shapes

Class PrimitiveShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.shapes.PrimitiveShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Oval, Rect

    public abstract class PrimitiveShape
extends Object
implements Shape
    Base class for primitive shapes. PrimitiveShape defines position and with and hight.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp
